ok i've renstalled headers pack and now I've /lib/modules/2.6.10-5-386/build directory, but in include/linux i've modversions.h!
check in build/include/linux/config/modversions.h u need to make a soft link to it buy going into build/include/linux and running ln -s config/modversions.h
